## Touch.isTouchEvent() function

Check whether a given event is a touch event or a pointer event.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isTouchEvent(e: Event | PseudoEvent): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | Event \| PseudoEvent | An event. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if it is a touch or pointer event; false otherwise.
